stories.Title: Better, faster, and cost-effective
stories.Description: Tesla constantly improves its manufacturing techniques. Their latest advancement reportedly involves a mold-making method that combines 3D printing and industrial sand.
stories.Tweet: Better, faster, and cost-effective 📦 Tesla constantly improves its manufacturing techniques. Their latest advancement reportedly involves a mold-making method that combines 3D printing and industrial sand. #tesla https://www.theverge.com/2023/9/14/23873345/tesla-gigapress-gigacasting-manufacturing-breakthrough

stories.Title: Efficiency is at its finest
stories.Description: Students from the Technical University of Munich are making history with an EV dubbed muc22, setting the world's distance record on a single charge by covering 1,599 miles with just 15.5 kWh.
stories.Tweet: Efficiency is at its finest 📦 Students from the Technical University of Munich are making history with an EV dubbed muc22, setting the world's distance record on a single charge by covering 1,599 miles with just 15.5 kWh. #electriccars https://arstechnica.com/cars/2023/09/1600-miles-on-a-single-charge-student-built-ev-sets-new-world-record/

stories.Title: An electrified roadmap
stories.Description: Toyota is aiming to offer longer journeys, faster charging, and affordability with their upcoming EVs, scheduled for 2026. According to the automaker they're set to provide nearly 500 miles of range.
stories.Tweet: An electrified roadmap 📦 Toyota is aiming to offer longer journeys, faster charging, and affordability with their upcoming EVs, scheduled for 2026. According to the automaker they're set to provide nearly 500 miles of range. #toyota https://electrek.co/2023/09/14/toyota-promises-new-evs-2026-500-mi-range/

stories.Title: The future of neonatal care
stories.Description: An artificial womb experiment is heading to human trials. The Extra-uterine Environment for Newborn Development, or EXTEND, aims to enhance outcomes for extremely premature babies.
stories.Tweet: The future of neonatal care 📦 An artificial womb experiment is heading to human trials. The Extra-uterine Environment for Newborn Development, or EXTEND, aims to enhance outcomes for extremely premature babies. #science https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02901-1

stories.Title: A bit of seismic activity
stories.Description: A recent study reveals an intriguing lunar phenomenon. Temperature fluctuations on the moon affect structures left behind by Apollo astronauts, leading to subtle moonquakes.
stories.Tweet: A bit of seismic activity 📦 A recent study reveals an intriguing lunar phenomenon. Temperature fluctuations on the moon affect structures left behind by Apollo astronauts, leading to subtle moonquakes. #space https://edition.cnn.com/2023/09/14/world/moonquakes-apollo-17-scn/

stories.Title: Conquering the night
stories.Description: Firefly Aerospace's Victus Nox mission was successfully launched within 27 hours of the call-up. Showcasing agility and responsiveness for future space operations.
stories.Tweet: Conquering the night 📦 Firefly Aerospace's Victus Nox mission was successfully launched within 27 hours of the call-up. Showcasing agility and responsiveness for future space operations. #space https://gizmodo.com/firefly-victus-nox-space-force-alpha-rapid-response-1850841861

stories.Title: Forget about expiration dates
stories.Description: Google has responded to Chromebook users' demands, and starting in 2024, they will be able to enjoy extended support for up to 10 years.

stories.Title: Pause and reflect
stories.Description: Many of us are already thinking about getting the iPhone 15 before the fear of missing out sets in. But hey! Waiting a bit longer might just be the smartest move.

stories.Title: Is your voice but multilingual
stories.Description: HeyGen's Video Translate tool has become viral. With the help of AI, users can now translate their videos into seven different languages with voices perfectly synced and cloned.

title: Tesla's manufacturing secret, Another hit for student efficiency, iOS 17 is coming
description: Tesla excels at constant self-improvement and defying expectations. According to insiders, the automaker is poised to make significant strides with its latest manufacturing techniques. Student innovations reached new heights this week. The muc22 from the Technical University of Munich shattered distance records. And finally, fellow Apple enthusiasts, iOS 17 is arriving on Monday – make sure to turn automatic updates on!
